import qualified Data.Text as T
import qualified Data.Text.IO as TI
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad.Trans.Class
import Control.Monad.Trans.Maybe
import Control.Arrow
import Data.Maybe
import Control.Monad

read'::T.Text->Int
read'=read.T.unpack

game::(Num a,Ord a)=>(a,a)->(a,a)
game (a,b) = 
	if a > b then
		(a+b,0)
	else if a==b then
		(a,b)
	else
		(0,a+b)
		
tailMay::[a]->Maybe [a]	
tailMay (_:xs) = Just xs
tailMay [] = Nothing

add::Num a=>(a,a)->(a,a)->(a,a)
add (a,b) (c,d) = (a+c,b+d)

convert::Show a=>(a,a)->String
convert (a,b) = show a++" "++show b

(<$~>)::Functor f => f a -> (a -> b) -> f b 
(<$~>)=flip (<$>)
infixl 4 <$~>

checkMaybe::(a->Bool)->a->Maybe a
checkMaybe f v = if f v then Just v else Nothing

toTuple (a:b:[])=(a,b)

run = runMaybeT$ do{
	n<-read<$>lift getLine;
	if n==0 then 
		MaybeT$return$Nothing 
	else
		return ();
	lift (sequence (replicate n TI.getLine))<$~>
		fmap (T.split (==' '))<$~>
		fmap (fmap read')<$~>
		fmap toTuple<$~>
		fmap game<$~>
		foldr add (0,0)<$~>
		convert>>=
		lift.putStrLn;
}
whileMaybeM::Monad m=>m(Maybe a)->m ()
whileMaybeM f = do
	r<-f
	if isJust r then
		whileMaybeM f
	else
		return ()
main = whileMaybeM run

{-# LANGUAGE BangPatterns#-}
module Main where

import Data.List
import Data.Maybe
import Control.Monad
import Data.Functor

main :: IO ()
main = do
  (cups,mvs) <- getNM
  unless (cups==0 && mvs==0) $
    do
      initState <- getState
      print $ solve mvs initState cups
      main
  where
    getNM::IO (Int,Int)
    getNM=do
       (n:m:_)<-map read . words <$> getLine
       return (n,m)
    getTray::IO [Int]
    getTray=do
      (n:try) <- map read . words <$> getLine
      return $ reverse $ take n try
    getState::IO GameState
    getState=do
      [ta,tb,tc] <-replicateM 3 getTray
      return $ GameState (Tray ta tb tc) []

data Move=AB|BA|BC|CB deriving(Eq,Show)

data Tray=Tray {trayA::[Int]
              , trayB::[Int]
              , trayC::[Int]
               }deriving(Eq,Show)

data GameState=GameState {tray::Tray
                        , history::[Move]}deriving(Show)
instance Eq GameState where
  (GameState tr1 _)==(GameState tr2 _)=tr1==tr2

solveS1::Straight->Int
solveS1 (ToA x) =solveS x
solveS1 (ToC x)=solveS x
solveS::Int->Int
solveS 0=0
solveS !n=2 + (3 * solveS (n-1))

solve::Int->GameState->Int->Int
solve mvs state len=fromMaybe ( -1) $ solve' [maxBound] mvs [state] mvs len
  where
    solve'::[Int]->Int->[GameState]->Int->Int->Maybe Int
    solve' !as !m !states !n !len=
      let min_=minimum as in
      case () of
        _ |null states -> Just min_
          |min_ <= m-n ->Just min_
          |0>n ->Nothing
          |otherwise ->      let (str,noStr)=span (isStraight1 . (`isStraight` len)) states
                                 anss=map ((+(m-n)) . solveS1 . (`isStraight` len)) str
                                 upds=concatMap (\s->moves (noReturn s) s) noStr
                             in solve' (anss ++ as) m (nub upds) (n-1) len



move::Move->GameState->Maybe GameState
move mv (GameState tray hist)=do
  tray' <- move'' mv tray
  return $ GameState tray' (mv:hist)
  where
    move''::Move->Tray->Maybe Tray
    move'' AB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (ta',tb') <- move' (ta,tb)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BA (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',ta') <- move' (tb,ta)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BC (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',tc') <- move' (tb,tc)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'' CB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tc',tb') <- move' (tc,tb)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'::([Int],[Int])->Maybe([Int],[Int])
    move' ([],_)=Nothing
    move' (x:xs,[])=Just (xs,[x])
    move' (x:xs,tr@(y:ys))
      |x>y =Just (xs,x:tr)
      |otherwise=Nothing

moves::[Move]->GameState->[GameState]
moves mvs state=mapMaybe  (`move` state) mvs

isClear::GameState->Bool
isClear (GameState (Tray _ [] []) _)=True
isClear (GameState (Tray [] [] _) _)=True
isClear _ =False


noReturn::GameState->[Move]
noReturn (GameState _ hi)=noReturn' hi
  where
    noReturn'::[Move]->[Move]
    noReturn' (x:_) =filter (/= x) [AB,BA,BC,CB]
    noReturn' []=[AB,BA,BC,CB]

data Straight=No|ToA Int|ToC Int
isStraight::GameState->Int->Straight
isStraight (GameState tr _) x=isStraight' tr x
  where
    isStraight'::Tray->Int->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc) n=
      let [lenA,lenC]=map length [ta,tc] in
      case () of
        _ |head tc==n && last tc== n-lenC && head ta==n-1-lenC && last ta== 1 ->ToA lenC
          |head ta==n && last ta== n-lenA && head tc==n-1-lenA && last tc== 1 ->ToC lenA
    isStraight' _ _=No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool
isStraight1 No=False
isStraight1 _=True

import Control.Monad (replicateM)

type Glass = Int
type MaxGlass = Int
type Trays = ([Glass],[Glass],[Glass])
type Goal = Int

main = do
    [maxGlass,limit] <- getLine >>= return . map read . words
    if maxGlass == 0 && limit == 0 then return () else do
        [t1,t2,t3] <- replicateM 3 (getLine >>= return . map read . tail . words)
        print $ solve maxGlass limit (t1,t2,t3)
        main

solve :: MaxGlass -> Int -> Trays -> Int
solve maxGlass limit ts = count `seq` if count <= limit then count else -1
    where
    count = min (stack maxGlass ts 1) (stack maxGlass ts 3)

stack :: MaxGlass -> Trays -> Goal ->  Int
stack maxGlass ts@(t1,t2,t3) goal = stack' goal 1
    where
    stack' goal glass
        | glass > maxGlass = 0
        | goal == 1 && glass `elem` t1 || goal == 3 && glass `elem` t3
            = stack' goal (glass+1)
        | goal == 1 && glass `elem` t2 || goal == 3 && glass `elem` t2
            = 1 + (stack' (otherside goal) (glass+1)) + (move (glass+1))
        | goal == 1 && glass `elem` t3 || goal == 3 && glass `elem` t1
            = 2 + (stack' goal (glass+1)) + 2 * (move (glass+1))

    otherside 1 = 3
    otherside 3 = 1

    move glass
        | maxGlass <  glass = 0
        | otherwise         = 2 + 3 * move (glass+1)

    isStraight'::Tray->Int->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray [] [] tc) n=ToC 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] []) n=ToA 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc) n=
      let [lenA,lenC]=map length [ta,tc] in
      case () of
        _ |head tc==n && head ta== n-lenC  ->ToA lenC
          |head ta==n && head tc== n-lenA  ->ToC lenA
          |otherwise->No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool

data Move=AB|BA|BC|CB deriving(Eq,Show)

              , trayB::[Int]
              , trayC::[Int]
               }deriving(Show)

data GameState=GameState {tray::Tray
                        , history::[Move]}deriving(Show)

solveS1::Straight->Int
solveS1 (ToA x) =solveS x
solveS1 (ToC x)=solveS x
solveS::Int->Int
solveS 0=0
solveS n=2 + (3 * solveS (n-1))

solve::Int->GameState->Int
solve mvs state=fromMaybe ( -1) $ solve' [maxBound] mvs [state] mvs
  where
    solve'::[Int]->Int->[GameState]->Int->Maybe Int
    solve' as m states !n=
      let min_=minimum as in
      case () of
        _ |min_ <= m-n ->Just min_
          |0>n ->Nothing
          |otherwise ->      let (str,noStr)=span (isStraight1 . isStraight) states
                                 anss=map ((+(m-n)) . solveS1 . isStraight) str
                                 upds=concatMap (\s->moves (noReturn s) s) noStr
                             in solve' (anss ++ as) m upds (n-1)



move::Move->GameState->Maybe GameState
move mv (GameState tray hist)=do
  tray' <- move'' mv tray
  return $ GameState tray' (mv:hist)
  where
    move''::Move->Tray->Maybe Tray
    move'' AB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (ta',tb') <- move' (ta,tb)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BA (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',ta') <- move' (tb,ta)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BC (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',tc') <- move' (tb,tc)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'' CB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tc',tb') <- move' (tc,tb)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'::([Int],[Int])->Maybe([Int],[Int])
    move' ([],_)=Nothing
    move' (x:xs,[])=Just (xs,[x])
    move' (x:xs,tr@(y:ys))

noReturn::GameState->[Move]

    noReturn' (x:_) =filter (/= x) [AB,BA,BC,CB]
    noReturn' []=[AB,BA,BC,CB]

data Straight=No|ToA Int|ToC Int
isStraight::GameState->Straight
isStraight (GameState tr _)=isStraight' tr
  where
    isStraight'::Tray->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc)
      |(ta==reverse (take (length ta) [1..])) && (tc==reverse (take (length tc) [(length ta + 1)..])) =ToA $ length tc
      |(tc==reverse (take (length tc) [1..])) && (ta==reverse (take (length ta) [(length tc + 1)..])) =ToC $ length ta
    isStraight' _=No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool
isStraight1 No=False
isStraight1 _=True

{-# LANGUAGE BangPatterns#-}
module Main where

import System.IO.Unsafe
import Data.List
import Data.Maybe
import Control.Monad
import Data.Functor

main :: IO ()
main = do
  (cups,mvs) <- getNM
  unless (cups==0 && mvs==0) $
    do
      initState <- getState
      print $ toAns $ solve2 [initState] mvs mvs
      main
  where
    getNM::IO (Int,Int)
    getNM=do
       (n:m:_)<-map read . words <$> getLine
       return (n,m)
    getTray::IO [Int]
    getTray=do
      (n:try) <- map read . words <$> getLine
      return $ reverse $ take n try
    getState::IO GameState
    getState=do
      [ta,tb,tc] <-replicateM 3 getTray
      return $ GameState (Tray ta tb tc) Nothing

data Move=AB|BA|BC|CB deriving(Eq,Show)

data Tray=Tray {trayA::[Int]
              , trayB::[Int]
              , trayC::[Int]
               }deriving(Eq,Show)

data GameState=GameState {tray::Tray
                        , history::Maybe Move}deriving(Show)
instance Eq GameState where
  (GameState tr1 _)==(GameState tr2 _)=tr1==tr2

solveS1::Straight->Int
solveS1 (ToA x) =solveS x
solveS1 (ToC x)=solveS x
solveS::Int->Int
solveS 0=0
solveS !n=2 + (3 * solveS (n-1))

move2::GameState->Move->GameState
move2 (GameState (Tray ta tb tc) hi) mv=
  case mv of
    AB->(GameState (Tray (tail ta) (head ta:tb) tc) (Just AB))
    BA->(GameState (Tray  (head tb:ta) (tail tb) tc) (Just BA))
    BC->(GameState (Tray  ta (tail tb) (head tb:tc)) (Just BC))
    CB->(GameState (Tray  ta (head tc:tb) (tail tc)) (Just CB))

toAns::Maybe Int ->Int
toAns x=fromMaybe (-1) x

solve2::[GameState]->Int->Int->Maybe Int
solve2 _ _ (-1) =Nothing
solve2 states lim !n=
  case () of
    _ |any isClear states->Just (lim-n)
      |otherwise-> solve2 (concatMap (\s->map (move2 s) (canMove s)) states) lim (n-1)

canMove::GameState->[Move]
canMove (GameState tr Nothing)=canMove' tr
canMove (GameState tr (Just mv))=delete (rev mv) (canMove' tr)

rev::Move->Move
rev AB=BA
rev BA=AB
rev BC=CB
rev CB=BC

canMove'::Tray->[Move]
canMove' (Tray ta tb tc)=
      case (ta,tb,tc) of
        ([],[],_)->[CB]
        (_,[],[])->[AB]
        ([],_,[])->[BA,BC]
        ((a:as),(b:bs),[])->(if a>b then AB else BA):BC:[]
        (_,[],_)->[AB,CB]
        ([],(b:bs),(c:cs))->(if b>c then BC else CB):BA:[]
        ((a:as),(b:bs),(c:cs))->(if a>b then AB else BA):(if b>c then BC else CB):[]

canClear::GameState->Int->Int->Bool
canClear (GameState (Tray ta tb tc) _) n lim=(lim+1)*3 >= (solveS $ n - (max (lenInclease ta) (lenInclease tc)))

lenInclease1::GameState->Int
lenInclease1 (GameState (Tray ta _ tc) _)=max (lenInclease ta) (lenInclease tc)

lenInclease::[Int]->Int
lenInclease list=length . takeWhile id $ zipWith ($) (map (==) [1..]) (reverse list)

move::Move->GameState->Maybe GameState
move mv (GameState tray hist)=do
  tray' <- move'' mv tray
  return $ GameState tray' (Just mv)
  where
    move''::Move->Tray->Maybe Tray
    move'' AB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (ta',tb') <- move' (ta,tb)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BA (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',ta') <- move' (tb,ta)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BC (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',tc') <- move' (tb,tc)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'' CB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tc',tb') <- move' (tc,tb)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'::([Int],[Int])->Maybe([Int],[Int])
    move' ([],_)=Nothing
    move' (x:xs,[])=Just (xs,[x])
    move' (x:xs,tr@(y:ys))
      |x>y =Just (xs,x:tr)
      |otherwise=Nothing

moves::[Move]->GameState->[GameState]
moves mvs state=mapMaybe  (`move` state) mvs

isClear::GameState->Bool
isClear (GameState (Tray _ [] []) _)=True
isClear (GameState (Tray [] [] _) _)=True
isClear _ =False


noReturn::GameState->[Move]
noReturn (GameState _ hi)=noReturn' hi
  where
    noReturn'::Maybe Move->[Move]
    noReturn' (Just x)=filter (/= x) [AB,BA,BC,CB]
    noReturn' Nothing=[AB,BA,BC,CB]

data Straight=No|ToA Int|ToC Int
isStraight::GameState->Int->Straight
isStraight (GameState tr _) x=isStraight' tr x
  where
    isStraight'::Tray->Int->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray [] [] tc) n=ToC 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] []) n=ToA 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc) n=
      let [lenA,lenC]=map length [ta,tc] in
      case () of
        _ |head tc==n && head ta== n-lenC  ->ToA lenC
          |head ta==n && head tc== n-lenA  ->ToC lenA
          |otherwise->No
    isStraight' _ _=No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool
isStraight1 No=False
isStraight1 _=True

split::(a->Bool)->[a]->([a],[a])
split f list=foldr (\x (ts,fs)->if f x then (x:ts,fs) else (ts,x:fs)) ([],[]) list

del::Eq a=>[a]->[a]->[a]
del delList target=delList ++ filter (not . (`elem` delList)) target

import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad

h 0 = 0
h n = 3 * h (n - 1) + 1

fa :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int] -> Int -> Int
fa [] [] [] 0 = 0
fa (a:as) b c n
  | a == n = fa as b c (n - 1)
fa a (b:bs) c n
  | b == n = fc a bs c (n - 1) + 1 + 2 * h (n - 1)
fa a b (c:cs) n
  | c == n = fa a b cs (n - 1) + 1 + h (n - 1) + h n

fb :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int] -> Int -> Int
fb [] [] [] 0 = 0
fb (a:as) b c n
  | a == n = fc as b c (n - 1) + 1 + h (n - 1)
fb a (b:bs) c n
  | b == n = fb a bs c (n - 1)
fb a b (c:cs) n
  | c == n = fa a b cs (n - 1) + 1 + h (n - 1)

fc :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int] -> Int -> Int
fc a b c n = fa c b a n

f :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int] -> Int -> Int
f a b c n = min stepA stepC
  where stepA = fa a b c n
        stepC = fc a b c n

g :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int] -> Int -> Int
g a0 b0 c0 n = f a b c n
  where a = map (\x -> n + 1 - x) a0
        b = map (\x -> n + 1 - x) b0
        c = map (\x -> n + 1 - x) c0

main = do
  [n, m] <- map read . words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
  unless ([n, m] == [0, 0]) $ do
    _:a <- map read . words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
    _:b <- map read . words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
    _:c <- map read . words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
    let step = g a b c n
    let answer = if step <= m then step else -1
    print answer
    main

move2 (GameState (Tray ta tb tc) hi) mv=
  case mv of
    AB->(GameState (Tray (tail ta) (head ta:tb) tc) (Just AB))
    BA->(GameState (Tray  (head tb:ta) (tail tb) tc) (Just BA))
    BC->(GameState (Tray  ta (tail tb) (head tb:tc)) (Just BC))
    CB->(GameState (Tray  ta (head tc:tb) (tail tc)) (Just CB))

toAns::Maybe Int ->Int
toAns x=fromMaybe (-1) x

solve2::[GameState]->Int->Int->Maybe Int
solve2 _ _ (-1) =Nothing
solve2 states lim !n=
  case () of
    _ |any isClear states->Just (lim-n)
      |otherwise-> solve2 (concatMap (\s->map (move2 s) (canMove s)) states) lim (n-1)

canMove::GameState->[Move]
canMove (GameState tr Nothing)=canMove' tr
canMove (GameState tr (Just mv))=delete (rev mv) (canMove' tr)

rev::Move->Move
rev AB=BA
rev BA=AB
rev BC=CB
rev CB=BC

canMove'::Tray->[Move]
canMove' (Tray ta tb tc)=
      case (ta,tb,tc) of
        ([],[],_)->[CB]
        (_,[],[])->[AB]
        ([],_,[])->[BA,BC]
        ((a:as),(b:bs),[])->(if a>b then AB else BA):BC:[]
        (_,[],_)->[AB,CB]
        ([],(b:bs),(c:cs))->(if b>c then BC else CB):BA:[]
        ((a:as),(b:bs),(c:cs))->(if a>b then AB else BA):(if b>c then BC else CB):[]

solve::Int->GameState->Int->Int
solve mvs state len=fromMaybe ( -1) $ solve' maxBound mvs [state] mvs len
  where
    solve'::Int->Int->[GameState]->Int->Int->Maybe Int
    solve' record m states !n l =let !q=unsafePerformIO $ print (record,n,(length states))in
      case () of
        _ |null states -> Just record
          |record <= m-n ->Just record
          |0>n ->Nothing
          |otherwise ->      let upds=concatMap (\s->moves (noReturn s) s) states
                                 sorted=nub . sortOn lenInclease1 $ upds
                                 std=lenInclease1 $ head sorted
                                 sieved= takeWhile ((==std) . lenInclease1) sorted
                                 (str,noStr)=split (isStraight1 . (`isStraight` l)) sieved
                                 anss=map ((+(m-n+1)) . solveS1 . (`isStraight` l)) str
                             in solve' (minimum (record:anss)) m sieved (n-1) l

canClear::GameState->Int->Int->Bool
canClear (GameState (Tray ta tb tc) _) n lim=(lim+1)*3 >= (solveS $ n - (max (lenInclease ta) (lenInclease tc)))

lenInclease1::GameState->Int
lenInclease1 (GameState (Tray ta _ tc) _)=max (lenInclease ta) (lenInclease tc)

lenInclease::[Int]->Int
lenInclease list=length . takeWhile id $ zipWith ($) (map (==) [1..]) (reverse list)

move::Move->GameState->Maybe GameState
move mv (GameState tray hist)=do
  tray' <- move'' mv tray
  return $ GameState tray' (Just mv)
  where
    move''::Move->Tray->Maybe Tray
    move'' AB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (ta',tb') <- move' (ta,tb)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BA (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',ta') <- move' (tb,ta)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BC (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',tc') <- move' (tb,tc)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'' CB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tc',tb') <- move' (tc,tb)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'::([Int],[Int])->Maybe([Int],[Int])
    move' ([],_)=Nothing
    move' (x:xs,[])=Just (xs,[x])
    move' (x:xs,tr@(y:ys))
      |x>y =Just (xs,x:tr)
      |otherwise=Nothing

moves::[Move]->GameState->[GameState]
moves mvs state=mapMaybe  (`move` state) mvs

isClear::GameState->Bool
isClear (GameState (Tray _ [] []) _)=True
isClear (GameState (Tray [] [] _) _)=True
isClear _ =False


noReturn::GameState->[Move]
noReturn (GameState _ hi)=noReturn' hi
  where
    noReturn'::Maybe Move->[Move]
    noReturn' (Just x)=filter (/= x) [AB,BA,BC,CB]
    noReturn' Nothing=[AB,BA,BC,CB]

data Straight=No|ToA Int|ToC Int
isStraight::GameState->Int->Straight
isStraight (GameState tr _) x=isStraight' tr x
  where
    isStraight'::Tray->Int->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray [] [] tc) n=ToC 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] []) n=ToA 0
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc) n=
      let [lenA,lenC]=map length [ta,tc] in
      case () of
        _ |head tc==n && head ta== n-lenC  ->ToA lenC
          |head ta==n && head tc== n-lenA  ->ToC lenA
          |otherwise->No
    isStraight' _ _=No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool
isStraight1 No=False
isStraight1 _=True

split::(a->Bool)->[a]->([a],[a])
split f list=foldr (\x (ts,fs)->if f x then (x:ts,fs) else (ts,x:fs)) ([],[]) list

del::Eq a=>[a]->[a]->[a]
del delList target=delList ++ filter (not . (`elem` delList)) target

import Control.Applicative ((<$>))
import Control.Monad (unless)
import Data.Set (Set)
import qualified Data.Set as S

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n, m] <- f
  unless (n == 0 && m == 0) $ do
    xs <- reverse <$> tail <$> f
    ys <- reverse <$> tail <$> f
    zs <- reverse <$> tail <$> f
    print $ solve n m (xs, ys, zs)
    main
  where f = map read <$> words <$> getLine
  
solve :: Int -> Int -> ([Int], [Int], [Int]) -> Int
solve n m cup = f (S.insert cup S.empty) (S.insert cup S.empty) 0
  where f hs cs ct | ct > m = (-1)
                   | S.member g1 cs || S.member g2 cs = ct
                   | otherwise = let ns = S.foldl h S.empty cs in f (S.union hs ns) (S.difference ns hs) (ct+1)
        h s ([], [], (z:zs)) = S.insert ([], [z], zs) s
        h s ((x:xs), [], []) = S.insert (xs, [x], []) s
        h s ([], (y:ys), []) = S.insert ([], ys, [y]) (S.insert ([y], ys, []) s)
        h s ([], (y:ys), (z:zs)) = let s' = S.insert ([y],ys,(z:zs)) s
                                   in S.insert (if y > z then ([], ys, (y:z:zs)) else ([], (z:y:ys), zs)) s'
        h s ((x:xs), [], (z:zs)) = let s' = S.insert (xs, [x], (z:zs)) s
                                   in S.insert ((x:xs), [z], zs) s'
        h s ((x:xs), (y:ys), []) = let s' = S.insert ((x:xs), ys, [y]) s
                                   in S.insert (if x > y then (xs, (x:y:ys), []) else ((y:x:xs), ys, [])) s'
        h s ((x:xs), (y:ys), (z:zs)) = let s' = S.insert (if x > y then (xs, (x:y:ys), (z:zs)) else ((y:x:xs), ys, (z:zs))) s
                                       in S.insert (if y > z then ((x:xs), ys, (y:z:zs)) else ((x:xs), (z:y:ys), zs)) s'
        g1 = ([n,n-1 .. 1], [], [])
        g2 = ([], [], [n,n-1 .. 1])

data Move=AB|BA|BC|CB deriving(Eq,Show)

data Tray=Tray {trayA::[Int]
              , trayB::[Int]
              , trayC::[Int]
               }deriving(Show)

data GameState=GameState {tray::Tray
                        , history::[Move]}deriving(Show)

solveS1::Straight->Int
solveS1 (ToA x) =solveS x
solveS1 (ToC x)=solveS x
solveS::Int->Int
solveS 0=0
solveS n=2 + (3 * solveS (n-1))

solve::Int->GameState->Int
solve mvs state=fromMaybe ( -1) $ solve' [maxBound] mvs [state] mvs
  where
    solve'::[Int]->Int->[GameState]->Int->Maybe Int
    solve' as m states !n=
      let min_=minimum as in
      case () of
        _ |null states -> Just min_
          |min_ <= m-n ->Just min_
          |0>n ->Nothing
          |otherwise ->      let (str,noStr)=span (isStraight1 . isStraight) states
                                 anss=map ((+(m-n)) . solveS1 . isStraight) str
                                 upds=concatMap (\s->moves (noReturn s) s) noStr
                             in solve' (anss ++ as) m upds (n-1)



move::Move->GameState->Maybe GameState
move mv (GameState tray hist)=do
  tray' <- move'' mv tray
  return $ GameState tray' (mv:hist)
  where
    move''::Move->Tray->Maybe Tray
    move'' AB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (ta',tb') <- move' (ta,tb)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BA (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',ta') <- move' (tb,ta)
      return $ Tray ta' tb' tc
    move'' BC (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tb',tc') <- move' (tb,tc)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'' CB (Tray ta tb tc)=do
      (tc',tb') <- move' (tc,tb)
      return $ Tray ta tb' tc'
    move'::([Int],[Int])->Maybe([Int],[Int])
    move' ([],_)=Nothing
    move' (x:xs,[])=Just (xs,[x])
    move' (x:xs,tr@(y:ys))
      |x>y =Just (xs,x:tr)
      |otherwise=Nothing

moves::[Move]->GameState->[GameState]
moves mvs state=mapMaybe  (`move` state) mvs

isClear::GameState->Bool
isClear (GameState (Tray _ [] []) _)=True
isClear (GameState (Tray [] [] _) _)=True
isClear _ =False


noReturn::GameState->[Move]
noReturn (GameState _ hi)=noReturn' hi
  where
    noReturn'::[Move]->[Move]
    noReturn' (x:_) =filter (/= x) [AB,BA,BC,CB]
    noReturn' []=[AB,BA,BC,CB]

data Straight=No|ToA Int|ToC Int
isStraight::GameState->Straight
isStraight (GameState tr _)=isStraight' tr
  where
    isStraight'::Tray->Straight
    isStraight' (Tray ta [] tc)
      |(ta==reverse (take (length ta) [1..])) && (tc==reverse (take (length tc) [(length ta + 1)..])) =ToA $ length tc
      |(tc==reverse (take (length tc) [1..])) && (ta==reverse (take (length ta) [(length tc + 1)..])) =ToC $ length ta
    isStraight' _=No

isStraight1::Straight->Bool
isStraight1 No=False
isStraight1 _=True

Problem = Struct.new(:cup_count, :swap_limit, :trays) do
  def solve
    steps = dive(0, trays)[0]
    p steps > swap_limit ? -1 : steps
  end
  
  private
  
  def dive(swap_count, trays)
    # p [:dive, swap_count, trays]
    
    if swap_count > swap_limit
      return swap_count, trays
    end
  
    lesser, max = lesser_and_max(trays)
    lesser == max and raise "assertion failed: lesser != max"
    max.nil? and raise "assertion failed: !max.nil?"
    
    if lesser.nil?
      if max == 1
        count, moved = move(max, 0, trays)
        return count + swap_count, trays
      else
        return swap_count, trays
      end
    end
  
    other = ([0, 1, 2] - [max, lesser])[0]
    
    if max == 1
      c1, t1 = move(max, other, trays)
      c2, t2 = move(lesser, max, t1)
      way1 = dive swap_count + c1 + c2, t2
      
      c3, t3 = move(max, lesser, trays)
      way2 = dive swap_count + c3, t3
      
      if way1[0] < way2[0]
        way1
      else
        way2
      end
    else
      c1, t1 = move1(lesser, other, trays)
      c2, t2 = move(max, other, t1)
      way1 = dive swap_count + c1 + c2, t2
      
      c3, t3 = move(max, lesser, trays)
      way2 = dive swap_count + c3, t3
      
      if way1[0] < way2[0]
        way1
      else
        way2
      end
    end
  end
  
  def lesser_and_max(trays)
    trays.each_with_index.
      sort_by {|t,i| t.last || -1 }[1..-1].
      map {|x,i| i unless x.empty? }
  end
  
  def move1(from, to, trays)
    # p [:move1, from, to, trays]
    from != to or raise "source and trays must differ"
    
    trays = trays.dup
    trays[to] = trays[to].dup.push trays[from].last
    trays[from] = trays[from][0..-2]
    
    steps = to == 1 || from == 1 ? 1 : 2
    
    return steps, trays
  end
  
  def move(from, to, trays)
    # p [:move, from, to, trays]
    from != to or raise "source and trays must differ"
    
    from_tray = trays[from]
    
    from_tray.empty? and raise "The source tray must not be empty"
    
    if from_tray.size == 1
      return *move1(from, to, trays)
    end
    
    i = from_tray.size - 1
    while from_tray[i - 1] == from_tray[i] - 1
      i -= 1
    end
  
    trays = trays.dup
    trays[to] = trays[to] + from_tray[i..-1]
    trays[from] = trays[from][0...i]
    
    steps = 3 ** (from_tray.size - i) - 1
    steps /= 2 if to == 1 || from == 1
    
    return steps, trays
  end
end

Problem = Struct.new(:cup_count, :swap_limit, :trays) do
  def solve
    steps = dive(0, trays)[0]
    p steps > swap_limit ? -1 : steps
  end
  
  private
  
  def dive(swap_count, trays)
    # p [:dive, swap_count, trays]
    
    if swap_count > swap_limit
      return swap_count, trays
    end
  
    lesser, max = lesser_and_max(trays)
    lesser == max and raise "assertion failed: lesser != max"
    max.nil? and raise "assertion failed: !max.nil?"
    
    if lesser.nil?
      if max == 1
        count, moved = move(max, 0, trays)
        return count + swap_count, trays
      else
        return swap_count, trays
      end
    end
    
    if max == 1
      count, t1 = move(max, lesser, trays)
      return *dive(count + swap_count, t1)
    else
      other = ([0, 1, 2] - [max, lesser])[0]
      
      c1, t1 = move1(lesser, other, trays)
      c2, t2 = move(max, other, t1)
      way1 = dive swap_count + c1 + c2, t2
      
      c3, t3 = move(max, lesser, trays)
      way2 = dive swap_count + c3, t3
      
      if way1[0] < way2[0]
        way1
      else
        way2
      end
    end
  end
  
  def lesser_and_max(trays)
    trays.each_with_index.
      sort_by {|t,i| t.last || -1 }[1..-1].
      map {|x,i| i unless x.empty? }
  end
  
  def move1(from, to, trays)
    #p [:move1, from, to, trays]
    from != to or raise "Source and Destination must differ"
    
    trays = trays.dup
    trays[to] = trays[to].dup.push trays[from].last
    trays[from] = trays[from][0..-2]
    
    steps = to == 1 || from == 1 ? 1 : 2
    
    return steps, trays
  end
  
  def move(from, to, trays)
    # p [:move, from, to, trays]
    from != to or raise "Source and Destination must differ"
    
    from_tray = trays[from]
    
    from_tray.empty? and raise "The source tray must not be empty"
    from_tray.last == cup_count or raise "The source tray must have the biggest cup"
    
    if from_tray.size == 1
      return *move1(from, to, trays)
    end
    
    i = from_tray.size - 1
    while from_tray[i - 1] == from_tray[i] - 1
      i -= 1
    end
  
    trays = trays.dup
    trays[to] = trays[to] + from_tray[i..-1]
    trays[from] = trays[from][0...i]
    
    steps = 3 ** (from_tray.size - i) - 1
    steps /= 2 if to == 1 || from == 1
    
    return steps, trays
  end
  
  def a_to_c_steps
    @a_to_c ||= cup_count ** 3 - 1
  end
  
  def a_to_b_steps
    @a_to_b ||= a_to_c_steps / 2
  end
end

MAX_INT = 1 << 30

### subroutines

def arr2key(arr)
  key = 0
  ($n - 1).downto(0) do |i|
    key = key * 3 + arr[i]
  end
  key
end

def key2arr(key)
  arr = []
  for i in (0...$n)
    arr << key % 3
    key /= 3
  end
  arr
end

loop do
  $n, $m = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}
  break if $n == 0 && $m == 0

  ta = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}
  tb = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}
  tc = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}

  nta = ta.shift
  ntb = tb.shift
  ntc = tc.shift

  cups = []
  ta.each{|c| cups[c - 1] = 0}
  tb.each{|c| cups[c - 1] = 1}
  tc.each{|c| cups[c - 1] = 2}
  # p cups

  g0 = 0
  g1 = (3 ** $n) - 1

  st = arr2key(cups)

  dists = (g0..g1).map{MAX_INT}
  dists[st] = 0

  q = [st]

  while ! q.empty?
    u = q.shift
    next if u == g0 || u == g1 || dists[u] >= $m

    tops = [-1, -1, -1]
    cups0 = []
    key = u
    for i in (0...$n)
      cp = key % 3
      cups0 << cp
      key /= 3
      tops[cp] = i
    end
    #p tops

    nbrs = []
    if tops[0] > tops[1]
      cups1 = cups0.clone
      cups1[tops[0]] = 1
      nbrs << arr2key(cups1)
    end
    if tops[1] > tops[0]
      cups1 = cups0.clone
      cups1[tops[1]] = 0
      nbrs << arr2key(cups1)
    end
    if tops[1] > tops[2]
      cups1 = cups0.clone
      cups1[tops[1]] = 2
      nbrs << arr2key(cups1)
    end
    if tops[2] > tops[1]
      cups1 = cups0.clone
      cups1[tops[2]] = 1
      nbrs << arr2key(cups1)
    end

    d = dists[u] + 1

    for v in nbrs
      if dists[v] > d
        dists[v] = d
        q << v
      end
    end
  end

  dg = [dists[g0], dists[g1]].min

  puts (dg < MAX_INT ? dg : -1)
end

type trays = Tray of int list * int list * int list

type move_command = AB | BA | BC | CB

let finished = function
  | Tray (_, [], []) | Tray ([], [], _) -> true
  | _ -> false

let move (Tray (as_, bs, cs)) command =
  let move xs ys = match xs, ys with
    | x :: xs, [] -> (xs, [x])
    | x :: xs, y :: ys when x > y -> (xs, x :: y :: ys)
    | _ -> invalid_arg "move" in
  try
    Some
      begin
        match command with
        | AB -> let as_, bs = move as_ bs in Tray (as_, bs, cs)
        | BA -> let bs, as_ = move bs as_ in Tray (as_, bs, cs)
        | BC -> let bs, cs = move bs cs in Tray (as_, bs, cs)
        | CB -> let cs, bs = move cs bs in Tray (as_, bs, cs)
      end
  with Invalid_argument _ -> None

let next_states state =
  List.fold_left
    (fun acc ->
     function
     | None -> acc
     | Some s -> s :: acc)
    []
  @@ List.map (move state) [CB; BC; BA; AB]

let search initial_state max_swaps =
  let states = Queue.create () in
  Queue.push (initial_state, 0) states;
  let seen = Hashtbl.create 1024 in
  let rec search () =
    if Queue.length states = 0 then -1
    else
      let state, count = Queue.pop states in
      if finished state then count
      else if count > max_swaps then -1
      else if Hashtbl.mem seen state then search ()
      else
        begin
          Hashtbl.add seen state true;
          List.iter
            (fun next_state -> Queue.push (next_state, succ count) states)
            @@ List.filter
                 (fun state -> not @@ Hashtbl.mem seen state)
                 (next_states state);
          search ()
        end in
  search ()

let read_lines n =
  let rec read_lines n acc =
    if n = 0 then List.rev acc
    else read_lines (pred n) ((read_line ()) :: acc) in
  read_lines n []

let split str delim =
  let len = String.length str in
  let rec split offset acc =
    try
      let index = String.index_from str offset delim in
      split (index + 1) ((String.sub str offset (index - offset)) :: acc)
    with Not_found -> List.rev ((String.sub str offset (len - offset)) :: acc) in
  split 0 []

let rec solve () =
  let read_tray () =
    List.rev @@ List.tl @@ List.map int_of_string @@ split (read_line ()) ' ' in
  let line = read_line () in
  let n_cups, max_swaps = Scanf.sscanf line "%d %d" (fun n m -> (n, m)) in
  if (n_cups, max_swaps) = (0, 0) then ()
  else
    let tray_a = read_tray () in
    let tray_b = read_tray () in
    let tray_c = read_tray () in
    print_endline @@ string_of_int
    @@ search (Tray (tray_a, tray_b, tray_c)) max_swaps;
    solve ()

            if t > M:
                break
            if len(A) == N or len(C) == N:
                res = t
                break
            
            # A -> B
            if A[-1] > B[-1] and pre != 2:
                que.append((A[:-1], B + [A[-1]], C, t + 1, 1))

            # B -> A
            if B[-1] > A[-1] and pre != 1:
                que.append((A + [B[-1]], B[:-1], C, t + 1, 2))
            
            # B -> C
            if B[-1] > C[-1] and pre != 4:
                que.append((A, B[:-1], C + [B[-1]], t + 1, 3))
            
            # C -> B
            if C[-1] > B[-1] and pre != 3:
                que.append((A, B + [C[-1]], C[:-1], t + 1, 4))

from collections import deque

def main():
    N, M = map(int, input().split()) # N: M: 
    if N==0:
        exit()
    data = [0]*N
    map(int, input().split())
    for b in list(map(int, input().split()))[1:]:
        data[N-b]=1
    for c in list(map(int, input().split()))[1:]:
        data[N-c]=2

    next_set = deque([(data[:],0)])
    visit=set([tuple(data)])

    while next_set:
        q = next_set.popleft()
        data, t = q
        l = data[0]

        # M -1
        if t > M:
            return -1

        # A(C)
        for cnt, k in enumerate(data):
            if k != l:
                break
            if cnt == N-1 and k != 1:
                return t
            l = k

        pos = [N,N,N]
        k = 0
        for i, ABC in enumerate(data):
            if pos[ABC] == N:
                pos[ABC] = i
                k += 1
            if k == 3:
                break

        if pos[0] < pos[1]:
            data[pos[0]] = 1
            t_data = tuple(data)
            if t_data not in visit:
                next_set.append((data[:],t+1))
                visit.add(t_data)
            data[pos[0]] = 0
        else:
            data[pos[1]] = 0
            t_data = tuple(data)
            if t_data not in visit:
                next_set.append((data[:],t+1))
                visit.add(t_data)
            data[pos[1]] = 1

        if pos[1] < pos[2]:
            data[pos[1]] = 2
            t_data = tuple(data)
            if t_data not in visit:
                next_set.append((data[:],t+1))
                visit.add(t_data)
            data[pos[1]] = 1
        else:
            data[pos[2]] = 1
            t_data = tuple(data)
            if t_data not in visit:
                next_set.append((data[:],t+1))
                visit.add(t_data)
            data[pos[2]] = 2


while True:
    print(main())
